description.english: Execute a plan with all 5 characters.
description.german: Führe einen geplanten Zug mit allen 5 Charakteren aus.
description.french: Exécutez un plan avec les 5 personnages.
description.italian: Esegui un piano con tutti e 5 i personaggi.
description.koreana: 다섯 캐릭터 모두를 사용해 계획을 실행하십시오.
description.spanish: Ejecuta un plan con los 5 personajes.
description.schinese: 使用全部五位角色执行一次计划。
description.tchinese: 使用全部五位元角色執行一次計畫。
description.japanese: 5人のキャラクターすべてを使って計画を実行する
description.brazilian: Execute um plano com todos os 5 personagens.

description.english: Kill or knock out 5 guards at the same time with all 5 characters.
description.german: Töte 5 Wachen mit allen 5 Charakteren oder schlage sie bewusstlos.
description.french: Tuez ou assommez 5 gardes en même temps avec les 5 personnages.
description.italian: Uccidi o stordisci 5 guardie contemporaneamente con tutti e 5 i personaggi.
description.spanish: Mata o noquea a 5 guardias a la vez con los 5 personajes.
description.schinese: 使用全部五位角色同时杀死或击晕5名守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用全部五位元角色同時殺死或擊暈5名守衛。
description.russian: Убить или оглушить 5 стражников одновременно с помощью все 5 героев.
description.japanese: 5人のキャラクターすべてを使って5人の見張りを同時に殺す、または倒す
description.polish: Zabij lub znokautuj 5 strażników jednocześnie wszystkimi 5 postaciami.
description.turkish: 5 karakterin tümüyle aynı anda 5 muhafızı öldür veya bayılt.
description.brazilian: Mate ou nocauteie 5 guardas ao mesmo tempo com todos os 5 personagens.

description.english: Collect 17 badges.
description.german: Verdiene 17 Abzeichen
description.french: Obtenez 17 badges.
description.italian: Raccogli 17 medaglie.
description.spanish: Consigue 17 insignias.
description.schinese: 收集17枚徽章
description.tchinese: 收集17枚徽章
description.japanese: バッジを17個集める
description.brazilian: Colecione 17 emblemas.

description.english: Finish all missions.
description.german: Beende alle Missionen
description.french: Terminez toutes les missions.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones.
description.schinese: 完成全部任务。
description.tchinese: 完成全部任務。
description.japanese: すべての任務を完了させる
description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões.

displayName.english: One Bush to Hide Them All
displayName.french: Un buisson pour les cacher tous
displayName.spanish: Un arbusto para ocultarlos a todos
displayName.polish: Jeden krzak, by ukryć ich wszystkich

description.english: Hide with all characters in a single bush.
description.german: Verstecke alle Charaktere in einem einzigen Busch
description.french: Cachez tous les personnages dans un même buisson.
description.italian: Nascondi tutti i personaggi in un solo cespuglio.
description.spanish: Oculta a todos los personajes en un mismo arbusto.
description.schinese: 将全部角色藏在一个草丛当中。
description.tchinese: 將全部角色藏在一個草叢當中。
description.russian: Спрятать всех героев в одном кусте.
description.japanese: 全てのキャラクターを1つの茂みに隠す
description.polish: Ukryj się wszystkimi postaciami za jednym krzakiem.
description.turkish: Tüm karakterleri tek bir çalılıkta gizle.
description.brazilian: Esconda-se com todos os personagens em um único arbusto.

description.english: Kill 30 guards with the help of the environment.
description.german: Töte 30 Wachen mit Hilfe der Umgebung.
description.french: Tuez 30 gardes à l'aide de l'environnement.
description.italian: Uccidi 30 guardie con l'aiuto dello scenario.
description.spanish: Mata a 30 guardias con la ayuda del entorno.
description.schinese: 使用环境元素杀死30名守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用環境元素殺死30名守衛。
description.russian: Убить 30 стражников при помощи окружающей среды.
description.japanese: 環境の力を借りて30人の見張りを殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 30 guardas com a ajuda do meio ambiente.

displayName.english: He Had to Use His Leg
displayName.french: Il s'est servi de sa jambe
displayName.japanese: 足を使うしかなかった
displayName.brazilian: Ele teve que usar a perna

description.english: Kill 10 guards with Takuma's Sniper Rifle that are farther than 25 meters away from him.
description.german: Töte 10 Wachen mit Takumas Scharfschützengewehr, die weiter als 25 Meter von ihm entfernt sind.
description.french: Tuez avec le fusil de Takuma 10 gardes situés à plus de 25 mètres de lui.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 guardie a più di 25 metri di distanza con il fucile da cecchino di Takuma.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 guardias que estén a más de 25 metros de distancia con el fusil de francotirador.
description.schinese: 使用琢磨的狙击枪杀死10名距离他25米以上的敌人。
description.tchinese: 使用琢磨的狙擊槍殺死10名距離他25米以上的敵人。
description.russian: Убить 10 стражников при помощи снайперской винтовки Такумы с расстояния более 25 метров.
description.japanese: 巧磨の銃で25m以上離れた見張りを10人殺す
description.polish: Z karabinu snajperskiego Takumy zabij 10 strażników, którzy znajdują się ponad 25 metrów od niego.
description.turkish: Takuma'nın Keskin Nişancı Tüfeği ile  25 metre uzaktan 10 muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 guardas a mais de 25 metros de distância com a espingarda de Takuma.

description.english: Kill 20 guards with Mugen's Swordwind.
description.german: Töte 20 Wachen mit Mugens Klingensturm
description.french: Tuez 20 gardes avec l'Épée du Vent de Mugen.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 guardie con il Vento di Spada di Mugen.
description.spanish: Mata a 20 guardias con la Espada del viento de Mugen.
description.schinese: 使用无限的剑锋杀死20名守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用無限的劍鋒殺死20名守衛。
description.japanese: 武源の風斬りで20人の見張りを殺す
description.polish: Zabij 20 strażników za pomocą wichury ostrzy Mugena.
description.turkish: Mugen'in Kılıç Rüzgârı ile 20 muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate 20 guardas com o Vento da Espada de Mugen.

description.english: Use Aiko's disguise 15 times.
description.german: Benutze Aikos Verkleidung 15 Mal
description.french: Utilisez 15 fois le déguisement d'Aiko.
description.italian: Usa il travestimento di Aiko per 15 volte.
description.spanish: Usa el disfraz de Aiko 15 veces.
description.schinese: 使用爱子的伪装能力15次。
description.tchinese: 使用愛子的偽裝能力15次。
description.japanese: 愛琥の変装を15回使用する
description.brazilian: Use o disfarce de Aiko 15 vezes.

description.english: Kill 3 Samurai with Yuki.
description.german: Töte 3 Samurai mit Yuki.
description.french: Tuez 3 Samouraïs avec Yuki.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 samurai con Yuki.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 samurái con Yuki.
description.schinese: 使用友希杀死三名武士。
description.tchinese: 使用友希殺死三名武士。
description.japanese: 雪で侍を3人殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 3 samurais com Yuki.

displayName.english: An Even Older Trick in the Book
displayName.french: Le plus vieux truc du monde
displayName.italian: Il trucco più vecchio del mondo
displayName.brazilian: A carta na manga mais antiga

description.english: Distract 50 guards with Hayato's stone.
description.german: Lenke 50 Wachen mit Hayatos Stein ab.
description.french: Détournez l'attention de 50 gardes avec la pierre de Hayato.
description.italian: Distrai 50 guardie con la pietra di Hayato.
description.spanish: Distrae a 50 guardias con la piedra de Hayato.
description.schinese: 使用隼人的投石吸引50名守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用隼人的投石吸引50名守衛。
description.japanese: 隼人の石で50人の見張りの注意をそらす
description.polish: Odwróć uwagę 50 strażników za pomocą kamienia Hayato.
description.turkish: Hayato'nun taşı ile 50 muhafızın dikkatini dağıt.
description.brazilian: Distraia 50 guardas com a pedra de Hayato.

displayName.english: All Bad Things Come From Above
displayName.french: Tout ce qui est mauvais vient d'en haut
displayName.italian: Tutte le brutte cose vengono dall'alto
displayName.spanish: Todo lo malo cae del cielo
displayName.japanese: 悪いことはすべて上からやってくる
displayName.brazilian: Todas as coisas ruins vêm de cima

description.english: Kill 10 guards with a drop attack.
description.german: Töte 10 Wachen mit einer Sprungattacke.
description.french: Tuez 10 gardes en leur tombant dessus.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 guardie con un attacco in picchiata.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 guardias con un ataque en caída.
description.schinese: 使用落下攻击杀死10名守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用落下攻擊殺死10名守衛。
description.japanese: 落下攻撃で見張りを10人殺す
description.polish: Zabij 10 strażników upuszczając coś na nich.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 guardas com um ataque de queda.

displayName.german: Drei mal Zwei zum Preis von Einem
displayName.spanish: Tres veces dos gracias a una

description.english: 3 times in one mission, kill 2 guards at once with Mugen's Swordwind.
description.german: Töte 3 mal 2 Wachen auf einmal mit Mugens Klingensturm
description.french: 3 fois au cours d'une même mission, tuez 2 gardes avec l'Épée du Vent de Mugen.
description.italian: Per tre volte in una missione uccidi due guardie in una volta sola usando il Vento di Spada di Mugen.
description.koreana: 한 임무에서 무겐의 바람베기로 두 명의 적을 처치하는 것을 세 번 하십시오.
description.spanish: En tres ocasiones en una misión, mata a 2 guardias a la vez con la Espada del viento de Mugen.
description.schinese: 在一局游戏中三次使用无限的剑锋杀死2名守卫。
description.tchinese: 在一局遊戲中三次使用無限的劍鋒殺死2名守衛。
description.russian: Три раза одновременно убить 2 стражников Бурей мечей Мугена в течение одного задания.
description.japanese: 1つの任務で3回、武源の風斬りで2人の見張りを同時に殺す
description.polish: 3 razy w jednej misji zabij 2 strażników jednocześnie za pomocą wichury ostrzy Mugena.
description.turkish: Bir görevde  Mugen'in Kılıç Rüzgârı ile 3 kez aynı anda 2 muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate 2 guardas de uma vez com o Vento da Espada de Mugen 3 vezes em uma missão.

description.english: Kill a guard with a drop attack from a rope.
description.german: Töte eine Wache mit einer Sprungattacke von einem Seil aus.
description.french: Tuez un garde en lui tombant dessus depuis une corde.
description.italian: Uccidi una guarda con un attacco in picchiata da una corda.
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia dejándote caer desde una cuerda.
description.schinese: 从绳子上使用落下攻击杀死一名守卫。
description.tchinese: 從繩子上使用落下攻擊殺死一名守衛。
description.russian: Убить стражника атакой сверху, спрыгнув с каната.
description.japanese: 縄からの落下攻撃で見張りを殺す
description.polish: Zabij strażnika, zrzucając coś na niego z liny.
description.turkish: Bir ipten düşme saldırısı ile bir muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate um guarda com um ataque de queda por uma corda.

description.english: Talk to a samurai when disguised with Aiko.
description.german: Sprich mit einem Samurai während Aiko verkleidet ist
description.french: Parlez à un Samouraï en étant déguisée avec Aiko.
description.italian: Usa un travestimento di Aiko e parla con un samurai.
description.spanish: Habla con un samurái con Aiko disfrazada.
description.schinese: 使用爱子在伪装时与一名武士对话。
description.tchinese: 使用愛子在偽裝時與一名武士對話。
description.russian: Поговорить с самураем, пока Аико использует маскировку.
description.japanese: 愛琥の変装で侍と会話する
description.turkish: Aiko ile kılık değiştirmişken bir Samuray ile konuş.
description.brazilian: Fale com um samurai enquanto disfarçado com Aiko.

displayName.english: Good Old Rock... Nothing Beats That
displayName.german: Den guten alten Stein... den schafft keiner.
displayName.spanish: Nada mejor que un buen rocazo
displayName.japanese: 古き良き時代の岩…それに勝るものはない
displayName.turkish: Canım taş... Yerini hiçbir şey tutamaz.
displayName.brazilian: A boa e velha pedra... nada a supera.

description.english: Kill a samurai with a rock.
description.german: Töte einen Samurai mit einem Stein.
description.french: Tuez un Samouraï avec un rocher.
description.italian: Uccidi un samurai con una pietra.
description.spanish: Mata a un samurái con una roca.
description.schinese: 使用石头杀死一名武士。
description.tchinese: 使用石頭殺死一名武士。
description.japanese: 侍を岩で殺す
description.brazilian: Mate um samurai com uma pedra.

displayName.english: Everyone Likes to Pet the Tanuki
displayName.french: Tout le monde aime les Tanukis
displayName.spanish: ¿A quién no le gusta acariciar al tanuki?
displayName.brazilian: Todo mundo quer fazer carinho no tanuki

description.tchinese: 使用花盆殺死一名武士。

description.english: Find the perfect spot for sunbathing.
description.german: Finde den perfekten Ort zum Sonnenbaden.
description.french: Trouver un coin parfait pour prendre un bain de soleil.
description.italian: Trova il posto migliore per prendere il sole.
description.spanish: Encuentra el lugar perfecto para tomar el sol.
description.schinese: 找到做日光浴的最佳地点。
description.tchinese: 找到做日光浴的最佳地點。
description.russian: Найти идеальное место для принятия солнечных ванн.
description.japanese: 日光浴に最適な場所を探す
description.polish: Znajdź idealne miejsce do opalania się.
description.turkish: Güneşlenmek için mükemmel bir yer bul.

description.english: Throw a guard into a well.
description.german: Wirf eine Wache in einen Brunnen.
description.french: Balancez un garde dans un puits.
description.italian: Getta una guardia in un pozzo.
description.spanish: Tira a un guardia a un pozo.
description.schinese: 将一名守卫投入井中。
description.tchinese: 將一名守衛投入井中。
description.japanese: 井戸に見張りを投げ込む
description.brazilian: Jogue um guarda em um poço.

description.english: Finish the mission “Reunion at Nagoya”.
description.german: Beende die Mission „Wiedersehen in Nagoya“.
description.french: Terminez la mission « Réunion à Nagoya »
description.italian: Completa la missione «Riunione a Nagoya».
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Reunión en Nagoya».
description.schinese: 完成任务“重聚名古屋”。
description.tchinese: 完成任務“重聚名古屋”。
description.japanese: 任務「名古屋での再会」をクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão “Reunião em Nagoya”.

description.english: Kill all enemies at the mansion in Nagoya.
description.german: Töte alle Feinde am Anwesen in Nagoya.
description.french: Tuez tous les ennemis du Domaine de Nagoya.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i nemici nella villa a Nagoya.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los enemigos de la mansión de Nagoya.
description.schinese: 杀死名古屋豪宅中的全部敌人。
description.tchinese: 殺死名古屋豪宅中的全部敵人。
description.russian: Убить всех врагов в усадьбе в Нагое.
description.japanese: 名古屋の屋敷ですべての敵を殺す
description.polish: Zabij wszystkich wrogów w posiadłości w Nagoi.
description.brazilian: Mate todos os inimigos na mansão em Nagoya.

description.english: Come out of the other side of the river in Nagoya.
description.german: Erscheine auf der anderen Seite des Flusses in Nagoya
description.french: Émergez de l'autre côté de la rivière à Nagoya.
description.italian: Esci dall'altra parte del fiume a Nagoya.
description.spanish: Sal por el otro lado del río en Nagoya.
description.schinese: 从名古屋河流另一端离开。
description.tchinese: 從名古屋河流另一端離開。
description.russian: Выйти с другого берега реки в Нагое.
description.japanese: 名古屋の対岸から出てくる
description.polish: Wypłyń z drugiej strony rzeki w Nagoi.
description.brazilian: Saia do outro lado do rio em Nagoya.

description.german: Beende die Mission „Eine Nacht auf See“.
description.french: Terminez la mission « Une nuit en mer ».
description.italian: Completa la missione «Una notte in mare».
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Una noche en el mar».

displayName.english: He Did Not Use His Leg
displayName.french: Il ne s'est pas servi de sa jambe

description.english: Kill at least 3 guards in the mission “A Night at Sea”.
description.german: Töte mindestens 3 Wachen während der Mission „Eine Nacht auf See“.
description.french: Tuez au moins 3 gardes au cours de la mission « Une nuit en mer ».
description.italian: Uccidi almeno 3 guardie nella missione «Una notte in mare».
description.koreana: 한밤 중의 바다 임무 동안 적어도 경비병 3명을 처치하십시오.
description.spanish: Mata al menos a 3 guardias en la misión «Una noche en el mar».
description.schinese: 在任务“海边一夜”中杀死至少3名守卫。
description.tchinese: 在任務“海邊一夜”中殺死至少3名守衛。
description.russian: Убить минимум 3 стражников в задании «Ночное море».
description.japanese: 任務「海上の夜」で3人以上の見張りを殺す
description.polish: Zabij co najmniej 3 strażników w misji „Noc na morzu”.
description.turkish: “Denizde Bir Gece” görevinde en az üç muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate pelo menos 3 guardas na missão “Uma noite no mar”.

description.english: Finish the mission “The Best Laid Plans”.
description.german: Beende die Mission „Die Besten Pläne“.
description.french: Terminez la mission « Les plans les mieux échafaudés »
description.italian: Completa la missione «I piani migliori».
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Los mejores planes».
description.schinese: 完成任务“天衣无缝”。
description.tchinese: 完成任務“天衣無縫”。
description.japanese: 任務「最善の計画」をクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão “Os melhores planos estabelecidos”.

displayName.german: Takuma ist noch ein bisschen verschlafen

description.english: Don't kill anyone with Takuma during the mission “The Best Laid Plans.”
description.german: Töte niemanden während der Mission „Die Besten Pläne“.
description.french: Ne tuez personne avec Takuma au cours de la mission « Les plans les mieux échafaudés ».
description.italian: Non uccidere nessuno con Takuma durante la missione «I piani migliori».
description.koreana: 최선의 계획 임무 동안 다쿠마로 누구도 처치하지 마십시오.
description.spanish: No mates a nadie con Takuma en la misión «Los mejores planes».
description.schinese: 在任务“天衣无缝”中不使用琢磨杀死任何人。
description.tchinese: 在任務“天衣無縫”中不使用琢磨殺死任何人。
description.russian: Управляя Такумой, никого не убивать в задании «Наилучший план».
description.japanese: 任務「最善の計画」で巧磨を使って誰も殺さない
description.polish: Nie zabijaj nikogo Takumą podczas misji „Najlepsze plany”.
description.turkish: “En İyi Planlar” görevi sırasında Takuma'yla kimseyi öldürme.
description.brazilian: Não mate ninguém com Takuma durante a missão “Os melhores planos estabelecidos”.

description.english: Kill the Captain.
description.german: Töte den Kapitän
description.french: Tuez le Capitaine.
description.italian: Uccidi il Capitano.
description.spanish: Mata al capitán.
description.schinese: 杀死船长。
description.tchinese: 殺死船長。
description.japanese: 船長を殺す
description.brazilian: Mate o capitão.

description.english: Travel 1200 meters in water during the mission “The Best Laid Plans”.
description.german: Schwimme 1200 Meter in der Mission „Die Besten Pläne“.
description.french: Parcourez 1200 mètres dans l'eau au cours de la mission « Les plans les mieux échafaudés ».
description.italian: Viaggia per 1200 metri in acqua durante la missione «I piani migliori».
description.koreana: 최선의 계획 임무 동안 물 속에서 1200 미터를 이동하십시오.
description.spanish: Viaja 1200 metros por agua durante la misión «Los mejores planes».
description.schinese: 在任务“天衣无缝”中游泳超过1200米。
description.tchinese: 在任務“天衣無縫”中游泳超過1200米。
description.russian: Преодолеть 1200 метров, находясь в воде, во время задания «Наилучший план».
description.japanese: 任務「最善の計画」で1200m泳ぐ
description.turkish: “En İyi Planlar” görevi sırasında 1200 metre su yolculuğu yap.
description.brazilian: Viaje 1200 metros na água durante a missão “Os melhores planos estabelecidos”.

description.english: Finish the mission “Red Lights at Matsuyama”.
description.german: Beende die Mission „Die Roten Lichter von Matsuyama“.
description.french: Terminez la mission « Les nuits de Matsuyama ».
description.italian: Completa la missione «Luci rosse a Matsuyama».
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Luces rojas en Matsuyama».
description.schinese: 完成任务“松山红光”。
description.tchinese: 完成任務“松山紅光”。
description.japanese: 任務「松山の歓楽街」をクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua a missão “O yukaku em Matsuyama”.

description.english: Don't extinguish any light sources in Matsuyama.
description.german: Lösche keine Lichtquellen in Matsuyama.
description.french: N'éteignez aucune source lumineuse à Matsuyama.
description.italian: Non spegnere nessuna fonte di luce a Matsuyama.
description.spanish: No apagues ninguna fuente de luz en Matsuyama.
description.schinese: 不熄灭松山的任何光源。
description.tchinese: 不熄滅松山的任何光源。
description.russian: Не потушить ни один источник света в Мацуяме.
description.japanese: 松山であらゆる光源を消さない
description.polish: Nie zgaś żadnych źródeł światła w Matsuyamie.
description.brazilian: Não remova nenhuma fonte de luz em Matsuyama.

description.english: Kill 10 guards with traps in Hana Gakuen.
description.german: Töte 10 Wachen mit Fallen in Hana Gakuen.
description.french: Tuez 10 gardes avec des pièges à la Hana Gakuen.
description.italian: Uccidi 10 guardie usando le trappole ad Hana Gakuen.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 guardias con trampas en Hana Gakuen.
description.schinese: 在花学院使用陷阱杀死10名守卫。
description.tchinese: 在花學院使用陷阱殺死10名守衛。
description.russian: Убить 10 стражников с помощью ловушек в школе Сакуры.
description.japanese: 華学園の罠で見張りを10人殺す
description.polish: Zabij 10 strażników pułapkami w Hana Gakuen.
description.brazilian: Mate 10 guardas com armadilhas em Hana Gakuen.

description.english: Kill Lady Chiyo without getting a disguise.
description.german: Töte Lady Chiyo ohne eine Verkleidung zu besorgen.
description.french: Tuez Dame Chiyo sans obtenir de déguisement.
description.italian: Uccidi Lady Chiyo senza indossare un travestimento.
description.koreana: 변장을 하지 않고 치요 부인을 죽이십시오.
description.spanish: Mata a lady Chiyo sin disfrazarte.
description.schinese: 不使用伪装并杀死千代婆婆。
description.tchinese: 不使用偽裝並殺死千代婆婆。
description.russian: Убить госпожу Чио, не используя маскировку.
description.japanese: 変装せずに千代婦人を殺す
description.polish: Zabij lady Chiyo bez zdobywania przebrania.
description.brazilian: Mate Lady Chiyo sem pegar um disfarce.

displayName.french: Ce qui est fait est fait
displayName.italian: Ciò che è fatto è fatto
displayName.japanese: 過ぎたるは及ばざるが如し
displayName.polish: Co się stało, to się nie odstanie
displayName.brazilian: O que está feito, está feito

description.english: Kill Lady Chiyo with any character other than Aiko.
description.german: Töte Lady Chiyo mit einem anderen Charakter als Aiko
description.french: Tuez Dame Chiyo avec un autre personnage qu'Aiko.
description.italian: Uccidi Lady Chiyo con un personaggio diverso da Aiko.
description.koreana: 아이코가 아닌 다른 캐릭터로 치요 부인을 죽이십시오.
description.spanish: Mata a lady Chiyo con cualquier otro personaje que no sea Aiko.
description.schinese: 使用除爱子以外的角色杀死千代婆婆。
description.tchinese: 使用除愛子以外的角色殺死千代婆婆。
description.russian: Убить госпожу Чио любым героем, кроме Аико.
description.japanese: 愛琥以外のキャラクターで千代婦人を殺す
description.polish: Zabij lady Chiyo kimkolwiek innym niż Aiko.
description.turkish: Leydi Chiyo'yu Aiko dışında herhangi bir karakterle öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate Lady Chiyo com qualquer outro personagem que não seja Aiko.

description.english: Find all hidden caves in Hana Gakuen.
description.german: Finde alle verborgenen Höhlen in Hana Gakuen
description.french: Trouvez toutes les cavernes cachées de la Hana Gakuen.
description.italian: Trova tutte le caverne nascoste ad Hana Gakuen.
description.koreana: 하나 학원에서 모든 숨겨진 동굴을 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cuevas ocultas en Hana Gakuen.
description.schinese: 找到花学院中所有的密道。
description.tchinese: 找到花學院中所有的密道。
description.russian: Обнаружить все скрытые пещеры в школе Сакуры.
description.japanese: 華学園の隠された洞窟をすべて見つける
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie ukryte jaskinie w Hana Gakuen.
description.turkish: Hana Gakuen'deki tüm gizli mağaraları bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre todas as cavernas escondidas em Hana Gakuen.

displayName.japanese: 私たちを入れてください

description.english: Fail the Shrine riddle at the beginning 3 times.
description.german: Versuche erfolglos das Schreinrätsel am Anfang 3 mal zu lösen.
description.french: Ratez au moins 3 fois l'énigme de l'Autel.
description.italian: Sbaglia la risoluzione dell'enigma del santuario per 3 volte.
description.koreana: 처음 신사의 수수께끼에 세 번 실패하십시오.
description.spanish: Falla 3 veces el acertijo del santuario del principio.
description.schinese: 初始神社谜题失败3次。
description.tchinese: 初始神社謎題失敗3次。
description.russian: Не справиться с загадкой в часовне 3 раза.
description.japanese: 神社の謎解きに最初の3回失敗する
description.polish: 3 razy na początek nie rozwiąż zagadki w kapliczce.
description.turkish: Tapınak bilmecesinde arka arkaya üç kez başarısız ol.
description.brazilian: Falhe no enigma do santuário no início 3 vezes.

description.english: Listen to everything Kuma has to say.
description.german: Höre dir alles an, was Kuma zu sagen hat.
description.french: Écoutez tout ce que Kuma a à raconter.
description.italian: Ascolta tutto ciò che ha da dire Kuma.
description.koreana: 구마가 말하는 모든 것에 귀를 기울이십시오.
description.spanish: Escucha todo lo que Kuma tenga que decir.
description.schinese: 听完狸猫的所有对话。
description.tchinese: 聽完狸貓的所有對話。
description.japanese: クマの話をすべて聞く
description.polish: Wysłuchaj wszystkiego, co Kuma ma do powiedzenia.
description.brazilian: Ouça tudo o que Kuma tem a dizer.

displayName.french: Les secrets de la Hana Gakuen

description.english: Finish “The Secrets of Hana Gakuen”.
description.german: Beende die Mission „Die Geheimnisse von Hana Gakuen“.
description.french: Terminez la mission « Les secrets de la Hana Gakuen »
description.italian: Completa la missione «I segreti di Hana Gakuen».
description.spanish: Completa la misión «Los secretos de Hana Gakuen».
description.schinese: 完成任务“花学院之秘”。
description.tchinese: 完成任務“花學院之秘”。
description.japanese: 任務「華学園の秘密」をクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua “Os segredos de Hana Gakuen”.
